summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Odyssey Finds ecommerce store. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend core functionality works with minor UI issues in featured products display and category navigation from homepage.

ui_bugs.issue: Featured products section shows 0 products despite 8 products being available
Category links from homepage show 0 products instead of filtered results

integration_issues.issue: After successful order, redirects to cart page instead of home page
React warning about updating component while rendering during checkout

passed_tests: All 14 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Product filtering by category and condition on products page
Product detail page navigation and display
Add to cart functionality with size selection
Cart badge updates and item count display
Cart page quantity controls and item removal
Currency conversion across all currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, JPY)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix homepage featured products loading issue and category navigation from homepage. Address order placement redirect behavior. Resolve React component update warning in checkout.
